original_text: The king of Babylon gave Jehoiachin everything that he needed each day for the rest of his life.
korean_text: 그가 쓸 것은 날마다 왕에게서 받는 양이 있어서 종신토록 끊이지 아니하였더라

sentences.original_text: The king of Babylon gave Jehoiachin everything
sentences.korean_translation: 바빌론 왕은 여호야긴에게 모든 것을 주었습니다

sentences.original_text: for the rest of his life.
